29 May, 2013

Scriptogram Logo in Vector Form (.svg)

While working on a recent design, I suddenly needed a vector version of the scriptogram logo. I couldn't find one on the web, so I made one myself.

If you find yourself needing the scriptogram logo in vector form, you can download the version I created.
